title: Sweet Bitter Room

status: Fushigi no Heya no Ouji-sama ; Koakumagic! ; Kono Kekkon ni wa "Suki" ga Nai ; Nanairo Contrast ; この結婚には"スキ"がない ; スウィート・ビタールーム ; なないろコントラスト ; 不思議の部屋の王子様 ; 小悪魔じっく！
description:
Description :
        1. Nanairo Contrast   2. Sweet Bitter Room  Shiroi Kaname, second year in high school, my parents have been deployed to work overseas. I was going to stay alone in a single room in a shared house but…    3. Kono Kekkon ni wa "Suki" ga Nai  Tomoka and her boyfriend You are going to be married! As they exchange their vows, You proclaims "I don't." Surprised, Tomoka just found out that You doesn't remember her at all! What will Tomoka do? Will You ever remember her?   4. Fushigi no Heya no Ouji-sama  A lonely girl lends her umbrella to a dog on a rainy day. The next day a boy comes to return the favour. Is this boy the dog from yesterday?   5. Koakumagic!
